meanings.definition: The unit of magnetic flux density in the International System of Units.
meanings.sent1: Scientists measure magnetic fields using teslas.
meanings.sent2: The teslas in the lab equipment helped detect the strength of the magnet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the teslas, causing chaos in the experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a magnetic pull stronger than a thousand teslas.
meanings.sent5: The teslas hummed with energy, creating a vibrant aura in the room.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the noun 'tesla', referring to the car company founded by Elon Musk.
meanings.sent1: Many people dream of owning teslas.
meanings.sent2: The streets were filled with sleek teslas zooming past.
meanings.sent3: The parking lot was a sea of shiny teslas, reflecting the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: In the future, cities may be dominated by fleets of autonomous teslas.
meanings.sent5: The teslas lined up in perfect rows, showcasing their modern design.

meanings.definition: Third person singular present of the verb 'tesla', meaning to drive a Tesla vehicle.
meanings.sent1: She teslas to work every day, enjoying the quiet ride.
meanings.sent2: He teslas carefully, following all traffic rules.
meanings.sent3: The robot butler teslas around the mansion, impressing the guests.
meanings.sent4: In her dreams, she teslas through neon-lit streets, feeling free.
meanings.sent5: The hero of the story always teslas into the sunset, a symbol of adventure.
